title: Does the galaxy wearable app work for the google pixel 3a?
content:
Hi, I am planning on buying the Goggle Pixel 3a and am wondering is it compatible with the galaxy wearable app, as I would like to still be able to customise my galaxy buds. If anyone know if the app works on the phone please respond, thanks

Ciaran
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
